statements: SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes;
SELECT route_name, driver_name FROM waste_collection_routes;
SELECT truck_id, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes;
SELECT route_name, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE driver_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, driver_name, truck_id, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE truck_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, driver_name FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE collection_points > 10 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND collection_points BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT route_id, driver_name, collection_points FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'Route%' ORDER BY collection_points DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT driver_name FROM waste_collection_routes WHERE collection_points < 5 GROUP BY driver_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_name, driver_name FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_name, driver_name FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT route_name, driver_name, truck_id FROM WasteCollectionRoutes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, driver_name, truck_id FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE truck_id = 12345 ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CollectionPoints WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY point_name DESC;
SELECT point_name, latitude, longitude FROM CollectionPoints WHERE point_type = 'Residential' AND route_id = 2 ORDER BY latitude, longitude;
SELECT DISTINCT route_name FROM WasteCollectionRoutes JOIN CollectionPoints ON WasteCollectionRoutes.route_id = CollectionPoints.route_id WHERE CollectionPoints.point_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT route_name, driver_name, truck_id FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE route_id IN (3, 4) ORDER BY driver_name ASC;

SELECT route_name, COUNT(collection_point_id) AS total_points FROM WasteCollectionRoutes JOIN CollectionPoints ON WasteCollectionRoutes.route_id = CollectionPoints.route_id GROUP BY route_name HAVING total_points > 5 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE distance > 20;
SELECT route_id, route_name, collection_time FROM WasteCollectionRoutes INNER JOIN WasteCollectionSchedule ON WasteCollectionRoutes.route_id = WasteCollectionSchedule.route_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE '%west%';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_time, is_completed FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE is_completed = FALSE ORDER BY collection_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, SUM(fuel_used) AS total_fuel_used FROM FuelConsumption GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_fuel_used > 100;
SELECT route_id, cost, route_name FROM WasteCollectionRoutes JOIN FuelConsumption ON WasteCollectionRoutes.route_id = FuelConsumption.route_id WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, collection_date, start_location, end_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT driver_name, driver_phone, driver_email FROM Drivers;
SELECT truck_model, truck_capacity, fuel_type FROM Trucks;
SELECT route_id, collection_date, total_weight, fuel_consumed FROM CollectionLogs;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE driver_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, start_location, end_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_phone, driver_email FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT truck_model, truck_capacity, fuel_type FROM Trucks WHERE truck_capacity > 100 ORDER BY truck_capacity DESC;
SELECT route_id, total_weight, fuel_consumed FROM CollectionLogs WHERE total_weight > 5000 AND fuel_consumed < 1000 ORDER BY total_weight DESC, fuel_consumed ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM Drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT truck_make, truck_model, truck_capacity_kg FROM Trucks WHERE truck_capacity_kg >= 5000;
SELECT bin_id, location, bin_capacity_kg FROM WasteBins WHERE bin_capacity_kg < 1000;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionRoutes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteCollectionRoutes WHERE distance_km > 10 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number, truck_make FROM Drivers d JOIN Trucks t ON d.driver_id = t.truck_id;
SELECT route_name, collected_weight_kg FROM WasteCollectionRoutes r JOIN Collections c ON r.route_id = c.route_id WHERE c.collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bin_id, location, bin_capacity_kg FROM WasteBins WHERE bin_capacity_kg BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY bin_capacity_kg ASC;
